podsec_patch:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: nginx-858ddf8b75-sfvd7
  namespace: demo
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
      readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      runAsNonRoot: true
      runAsUser: 101
  securityContext:
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
summary: Hardened pod security context to comply with Pod Security Standards (restricted profile). Removed NET_ADMIN, SYS_ADMIN, and SYS_PTRACE capabilities, set allowPrivilegeEscalation to false, set readOnlyRootFilesystem to true, set runAsNonRoot to true, and set a non-zero runAsUser. Added seccompProfile.
